metadata.name: A poetic place
metadata.description:
My life went silent, my heart turned black
Lost somebody that never came back
My life full of stress
A mess
Everything so meaningless

Nevertheless
I let myself be, who I was, just me
The tears that I cried, the emotions that I felt
The love in my heart that I held

I found my passion again for story and art
This is the beginning, a new start
A place for my emotions that I feel in my heart
A poetic place for my stories and art

-----


A poem and artwork about the beginning of Poetic Places. This work is inspired by recent life events. The flower underwater symbolises a situation where it feels like you're out of your element. Luckily (and sadly) all things in life are temporary, even the worst parts of your life.
